suite.name: Amazon Testes

test.name: Caso de Teste 01 - Acesso ao menu "Eletrônicos"

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The geckodriver version (0.34.0) detected in PATH at C:\Users\SevenProGion\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python311\Scripts\geckodriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected firefox version (129.0.0.2295); currently, geckodriver 0.35.0 is recommended for firefox 129.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Acessar a home page do site Amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Verificar se o título da página fica "Amazon.com.br | Tudo pra você, de A a Z."
kw.source_name: Verificar se o título da página fica "${TITULO}"

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.msg: Page title is 'Amazon.com.br | Tudo pra você, de A a Z.'.
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verificar se aparece a frase "Eletrônicos e Tecnologia"
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Verificar se o título da página fica "Eletrônicos e Tecnologia | Amazon.com.br"
kw.source_name: Verificar se o título da página fica "${TITULO}"

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.msg: Page title is 'Eletrônicos e Tecnologia | Amazon.com.br'.
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Verificar se aparece a categoria "Computadores e Informática"
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Esse teste Verifica o menu electrônicos do site Amazon.com.br e Verifica a categoria Computadores e Informática

test.name: Caso de Teste 02 - Pesquisa de um Produto

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The geckodriver version (0.34.0) detected in PATH at C:\Users\SevenProGion\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python311\Scripts\geckodriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected firefox version (129.0.0.2295); currently, geckodriver 0.35.0 is recommended for firefox 129.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Acessar a home page do site Amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Digitar o nome de produto "Xbox Series S" no campo de pesquisa
kw.source_name: Digitar o nome de produto "${PRODUTO}" no campo de pesquisa

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Xbox Series S' into text field 'twotabsearchtextbox'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verificar o resultado da pesquisa se está listando o produto "Xbox Series S"
kw.source_name: Verificar o resultado da pesquisa se está listando o produto "${PRODUTO}"

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Esse teste Verifica a busca de um produto

suite.doc: Essa suite testa o site de Amazon.com.br
